per_frame_1=vol=bass+mid+treb;
per_frame_2=newvol=vol*.2;
per_frame_3=vol_att=bass_Att+treb_att+mid_Att;
per_frame_4=newvol_att=vol_att*.2;
per_frame_5=warp=warp*Sin(vol);
per_frame_6=rot=if(above(vol,vol_att),1,0);
per_frame_7=dx=dx+.05/2*sin(vol_att)*sin(time);
per_frame_8=dy=dy+.05/2*Sin(vol_att)*sin(time);
per_frame_9=zoom=zoom+.10*sin(vol*vol_att*.1);
per_frame_10=ob_r=ob_r*Sin(newvol);
per_frame_11=ob_b=ob_b*Sin(newvol);
per_frame_12=echo_alpha=1*sin(time);
per_frame_13=echo_orient=0+3*Sin(time);
per_frame_14=echo_zoom=echo_zoom-.3*Sin(time);
per_frame_15=wave_mode=7-1*if(below(wave_mystery,-wave_mystery),1,0);
per_frame_16=wave_mystery=wave_mystery+5*if(above(wave_mystery,bass),0,1);
per_frame_17=sx=sx-.20*sin(vol)+int(rand(1.5))*sin(time);
per_frame_18=sy=sy+.20*Sin(vol_att)+int(rand(1.5))*sin(time*0.53);
per_frame_19=//divide//
per_frame_20=wave_r=wave_R*int(rand(2))*Sin(vol*vol_Att);
per_frame_21=wave_g=wave_g*int(rand(5))*sin(vol_att);
per_frame_22=wave_b=wave_b*int(rand(4))*sin(vol);
per_frame_23=ib_r=int(rand(2))+int(rand(2))*sin(time);
per_frame_24=ib_b=int(rand(4))+ob_b*Sin(time);
per_frame_25=ib_g=int(rand(6))+.2*Sin(time);
per_frame_26=q30=vol*2;
per_frame_27=q3=vol*4;
per_frame_28=q1=.5;q2=.5;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_grad3;
warp_2=`
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float3 txr = float3(uv,q1*0.1);
warp_7=`    float2  uv2 =  uv;
warp_8=`    uv2 = uv + texsize.zx*(q3,q3);
warp_9=`    float3 color = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_10=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_mq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_11=`    color += tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv2) - 0.5; 
warp_12=`    uv += color*0.01; 
warp_13=`    //uv.y += abs(color*0.01) + bass_att*0.01;
warp_14=`    
warp_15=`    float2x2 rot = { cos(q9), sin(q9),
warp_16=`                      -sin(q9), cos(q9) }; 
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, ((uv-0.5)*(0.97 + rad*0.02)) + 0.5  + GetBlur1((uv - 0.5)*0.9 + 0.5)*0.1  - 0.01).xyz;    
warp_20=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`    ret =  tex2D(sampler_main, uv.yx).xyz + GetBlur3(uv.yx)*3;
comp_5=`    //ret *= 4.00; //gamma
comp_6=`    ret -= 0.1;
comp_7=`}
